name: Mew EX
author: MAHOU

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s). (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Replace
attacks.effect: Move as many Energy attached to your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
